TEI.2.document_title: James F Perry to James F Perry, 04-06-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: James F. Perry. Memorandum of account on trip to Texas, April 6, 1830.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 360
